nodes.text: Sawtooth was a legendary Uller who resided in the Dead Forest on Kashyyyk. He was responsible for the maiming of the great Rodian hunter Qakkee, who eventually hired an individual to kill him.
Sawtooth appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
